modName: 18 Black Katanas HD English Only - Fixed
summary: This is Black Widowmaker\'s mod, fixed by me.
descriptionHtml:
Link to the author\'s full mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3774

Looks like the author previously put in a bunch of work only to leave this beautiful project by the wayside with some easily remedied (but fatal) bugs. My first experience with any sort of modding, leave comment if working for you!

Changes:
-Fixed folder structure (no duplicate data folder)
-Fixed .esp file (no more lookup failed error on each weapon where enchantments are supposed to be)
-Deleted extra .esp from old version (causing invisible weapon)
-Deleted extra language files, now English only
author: Black Widowmaker
